          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The gender of nouns</string>
            <string language="fi">Substantiivin suku</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Geschlecht von Gegenstandswörtern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le genre des noms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O gender dos substantivos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il genere dei nomi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το γένος των ουσιαστικών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El género de sustantivos</string>
          </title>
          <language>ru</language>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A multiple-choice exercise where the correct gender is chosen for the given noun.</string>
            <string language="fi">Monivalintatehtävä, jossa annetulle substantiiville valitaan oikea suku.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">Opetushallitus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Mehrfachwahl Übung, in der das korrekte 
Geschlecht für das gegebene Gegenstandswort gewählt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice de multiple-choix où le genre correct
est choisi pour le nom donné.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício da múltiplo-escolha onde o gender 
correto seja escolhido para o substantivo dado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esercitazione di multiplo-scelta dove il genere
corretto è scelto per il dato nome.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια πολλαπλής επιλογής άσκηση όπου το σωστό γένος 
επιλέγεται για το δεδομένο ουσιαστικό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio de la mu'ltiple-opcio'n donde el 
género correcto se elige para el sustantivo dado.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
